subject: Barbaro (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Dr. Dean Richardson, Barbaro’s surgeon, said that Barbaro has responded well to a procedure done that removed all but 20 percent of the hoof wall on his left foot because of laminitis.
snippet: Dr. Dean Richardson, Barbaro’s surgeon, said that Barbaro has responded well to a procedure done that removed all but 20 percent of the hoof wall on his left foot because of laminitis.
